name: High School: Basics Education!
description:
Use lessons of our high school as a start on the road of becoming idle tycoon! Welcome to our high school, where you will have a many quests in basics of math and arithmetic. This Education and learning simulator will show you that only educated people can become an idle tycoon. In this simulator, you will have to collect notes and solve tasks in basics of math and arithmetic. You do not need calculator to complete these tasks. In our high school, you can count everything in your mind. So put your calculator away, remember everything you have learned from school and pass our exam in basics of math and arithmetic in our educational and learning simulator: High School: Basics Education! If you complete every task in math and arithmetic basics, it will not be a big deal for you to become and idle tycoon. Open this application to bring your brain a little workout.

In this educational and learning simulator, you will play as a student in our high school, who have to stroll through corridors and search notes. In these notes, you will find tasks of basics of math and arithmetic, which you have to complete without calculator. Our high school has many basic tests of math and arithmetic and the only way to escape the school is to pass every test in the game. Our high school is a powerhouse of education, which will help you make your first step on your road of becoming an idle tycoon. Remember everything you had learned at school and use your knowledge in our high school. Call your friends and play together to solve math riddles faster. If you cannot use calculator, it does not mean that you are not allowed to use help of friends.

High School: Basics Education! is a free to play educational and learning simulator. Solve our basic tests in math and arithmetic and collect notes to earn new tasks to solve. Collect every note with basic mathematical and arithmetical task and complete every math test to escape our high school. Solve hard tasks to become more educated and make your first step on your way to become a real idle tycoon in the future. Forget about calculator, in this place it is forbidden, but you can always ask your friends for help. Download our new educational and learning simulator and give your brain a nice workout in our high school.
